ORIGAM Documentation : Table View

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Nov 26, 2018

Properties related to the table view are in the Misc. property group.

GridVisible

If true, the table view is set as a default view.

HideNavigationPanelIf true, the toolbar panel won't be available.

It is possible to achieve a plain detail view by settings GridVisible (false) and HideNavigationPanel (true).
